title: Service Learning Instructional Design Workshop for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental knowledge in engineering and basic concepts of instructional design
context.additional_context: Acquiring methods to apply engineering service-learning in language education for current practitioners

learning_goals: Compare and analyze two service-learning instructional models (engineering design-based, instructional design-based) to cultivate the ability to select context-appropriate models.
Design a process to evaluate the effectiveness of service-learning activities using formative research methodologies.
Develop an assessment tool that measures seven core variables, including learner engagement, learning outcomes, and empathy.
Provide specific guidelines for improving instructional models through analysis of learner reflective journals.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
